title: Get Off the Road! (3U88)
text:
Set:	Realms of the Elf-lords
Kind:	Shadow
Culture:	Sauron
Twilight:	0
Card Type:	Event
Game Text:	Search. Shadow: Spot a [Sauron] minion and a Nazgul to make the Free Peoples player discard a card from the top of his or her deck for each burden you can spot.
Lore:	”'The Morgul-lord and his Black Riders have come forth. War is preparing!'”
Rarity:	U
